title: SweatApp
description: An all-inclusive course about designing, developing, and deploying SweatApp - a health and fitness mobile application
learningObjectives: Understand basics of fitness and health
Learn front-end and back-end development of a mobile app

finalProjectDetails.overview: For the final project, students will design, develop, test, and deploy their own fitness mobile application similar to SweatApp
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit a link to the deployed app, along with its source code and a document outlining design choices, major functions, and testing results
